title.en: Prayer to Lord Marpa, Consort and Heirs1

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: You who assumed the form of a wondrous mahāsiddha,
text.en-trans: ngotsar drubpa chenpö ku nyepa

text.en: Sublimedharma-king, master of mind and perception,
text.en-trans: nang sem wanggyur chökyi gyalpo chok

text.en: Magnificent translator, Lord Marpa Lotsāwa,
text.en-trans: dra gyur lotsa chenpo marpa jé

text.en: Sovereign of vastintelligenceand supreme mind,2
text.en-trans: lodrö chenpo lo chok ngawé dak

text.en: Keeper of the secret treasury of oceanic tantras,
text.en-trans: gyüdé gyatsö sangwé dzö dzinpa

text.en: Great universal ruler, who attained the state of union.
text.en-trans: zungjuk drubpé khorlö gyurwa ché

text.en: Your son, whom you blessed with your three secrets,
text.en-trans: gang gi sangwa sum gyi jinlab sé

text.en: Was the bodhisattva and magnificent tamer of beings
text.en-trans: changchub sempa pachen drowa dul

text.en: Darma Dodé, whose wondrous form arose from twofold accumulation.
text.en-trans: darma dodé tsok nyi mejung ku

text.en: A manifestation of Avalokiteśvara, embodiment of oceanic wisdom,
text.en-trans: yeshe gyatsö rang zuk chenrezik

text.en: Appearing in youthful form as a master of infinite aspiration.
text.en-trans: zhönnü kur tön mönlam tayé dak

text.en: Vajra Nairātmyā appearing in human female guise,
text.en-trans: dorjé dakmé mimö zuk gyurwa

text.en: Was the wisdom goddess and embodiment of bliss,
text.en-trans: sherab lhamo dewé daknyi ku

text.en: In whosebhagaof absolute space all the phenomena of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa are contained—
text.en-trans: khordé chö kün ying kyi bhagar dü

text.en: She who emanates and attracts all the victorious ones of the three times.
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa tro dang dü dzé ma

text.en: Foremost among all the adepts of Cakrasaṃvara,
text.en-trans: khorlo dompé drub rik yong kyi tso

text.en: Was the master for whom all movement within thelalanāandrasanā3
text.en-trans: lala na dang rasé gyuwa kün

text.en: Was eclipsed, consumed within the space of Rahū,
text.en-trans: drachen ying su zawar jepé dak

text.en: And who reached the culmination of the sixteen joys, the state of no-more-learning,
text.en-trans: chudruk tser sön mi lob gyalsar shek

text.en: He whose name alone guards against saṃsāra’s terror,
text.en-trans: tsen tö khorwé jik lé kyob dzé ching

text.en: The master who directly confers the greatest of blessings,
text.en-trans: jinlab chenpo ngönsum terwé dak

text.en: The one renowned as Dorje Gyaltsen and Töpa Ga,
text.en-trans: dorjé gyaltsen töpa ga zhé drak

text.en: Ornament of all three worlds, supreme among human beings.
text.en-trans: jikten sum gyi gyen gyur mi yi chok

text.en: Through this, my devoted prayer to the reverend and noble Guru,
text.en-trans: detar jetsün yabyum sé nam la

text.en: Together with his consort and heirs, inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: güpé soltab dak la jingyi lob

text.en: Let the great sun of co-emergent wisdom dawn within my mind
text.en-trans: rangsem lhenkyé yeshe nyima ché

text.en: To banish all the darkness contained within an ignorant heart.
text.en-trans: nying gi marik münpa kün sal zhing

text.en: May the city of the three worlds’ hostile forces be forever undone,
text.en-trans: si sum dra dé drongkhyer ten chom né

text.en: And may we savour the treasury of inexhaustible kāyas and wisdoms
text.en-trans: womin lhündrub zhalmé nyamgawar

text.en: Within the delightful, spontaneously present palace of Akaniṣṭha,
text.en-trans: ku dang yeshe dzemé ter la chö

text.en: And empty the three realms of saṃsāra from their very depths.
text.en-trans: kham sum khorwa dong né trukpar shok
